text: Chomu vy musyte rozdilyty sebe u dvi hrupy vidnosno lytsemiriv (sered vas)? BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zasudyv yikh vnaslidok yikhnʹoyi vlasnoyi povedinky. Vy zakhochete do dovidnyka tsey khto posylayetesʹ astray BOHOM? Whomever BOH posylaye astray, vy mozhete nikoly ne znayty shlyakh keruvaty nymy
